name: The Ghost of Jackson Past
description:
After being dead for 70 years, Jack Jackson has finally found a suitable host to bring him back to life. You ignored all the warnings and went into the Jackson Mansion and now you’re paying the price. If you can’t get to the helipad at the top of the Mansion in time, you will cease to exist.

This was an entry for the Trijam #100 and the theme was retro games. Thanks to freemusicarchive.org for the music, http://yrlab.zatunen.com/ for the gameboy effect, and https://opengameart.org/ for all the assets. Hope you enjoy.
